extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by identifying if it is running Microsoft Windows Server 2022 or Microsoft Windows 11 (21H2, 22H2).

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Latest Patches for Microsoft Windows Server 2022
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest patches for Microsoft Windows Server 2022, prioritizing Internet-facing systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Latest Patches for Microsoft Windows 11
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest patches for systems running Microsoft Windows 11.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable HTTP/3 via Registry Key
extracted_playbook.description: Disable HTTP/3 by modifying the registry key to mitigate the vulnerability on servers using buffered I/O.

cve_id: Microsoft Windows Server 2022 and Windows 11 Vulnerability
